message.entry: Cluster ''{0}'' is not ready to use. Visit {1} to check its status.
Cluster ''{0}'' is defined but has not been started. {1}
集群 ''{0}'' 自上次被访问后已重新启动。
There was a problem connecting to cluster ''{0}''. Visit {1} and verify that this computer''s public IP address is included on the Cluster Access page.
集群 ''{0}'' 处于 ''{1}'' 状态。要启动该集群，请运行 start(clusterObj) 命令或使用 {2} 上的 Web 界面。
连接到集群 ''{0}'' 时出现问题。请访问 {1}，并验证此计算机的公共 IP 地址是否包含在集群访问权限页面上。
Failed to establish a connection to cluster ''{0}''.
Could not get the logs from cluster ''{0}'', because: ''{1}''
请求了 {1,number,integer} 个工作进程，但提交的作业仅可使用其中的 {0,number,integer} 个。要等待所有请求的工作进程启动，请对集群调用 wait('online')。
The cluster certificate was not specified. Supply it or check that you are using the correct profile.
The cluster identifier was not specified. Supply it or check that you are using the correct profile.
Submitted job requested {0,number,integer} workers. The maximum number of workers for this cluster is {1,number,integer}.
集群 ''{0}'' 处于在线状态，但无法创建到它的连接。\n{1}
